macro.name: YYYY-MM-DD_format_validator
macro.validator: not value or (len(value.split('-')) == 3 and all(part.isdigit() and len(part)==expect_len for part, expect_len in zip(value.split('-'), [4,2,2])))

macro.name: lex_sam_header
macro.token_message: SAM header data may not contain non-ASCII characters.
macro.validator: not value or all(ord(c) < 127 for c in value)
